body_html:
I've been able to solve the problem by adding config=tf.contrib.learn.RunConfig(save_checkpoints_secs=1) to the Estimator call:

reg = learn.Estimator(model_fn=my_model,
                      model_dir=model_dir,
                      config=tf.contrib.learn.RunConfig(save_checkpoints_secs=1))

Can someone clarify for me what is happening here and how this helped?
Thanks,
David
body_text:
I've been able to solve the problem by adding config=tf.contrib.learn.RunConfig(save_checkpoints_secs=1) to the Estimator call:
reg = learn.Estimator(model_fn=my_model,
                      model_dir=model_dir,
                      config=tf.contrib.learn.RunConfig(save_checkpoints_secs=1)) 

Can someone clarify for me what is happening here and how this helped?
Thanks,
David
body:
I've been able to solve the problem by adding `config=tf.contrib.learn.RunConfig(save_checkpoints_secs=1)` to the Estimator call:

```
reg = learn.Estimator(model_fn=my_model,
                      model_dir=model_dir,
                      config=tf.contrib.learn.RunConfig(save_checkpoints_secs=1)) 
```

Can someone clarify for me what is happening here and how this helped?
Thanks,
David
